body.div: Invite friends over for an array of bakery goodies on a tablescape decked out for Halloween.

div.p: Find an outdoor spot for your table where trees frame the area, and then drape Spanish moss from the limbs for a spooky look. Top the table with fabric in neutral colors like this one featuring a black and white spiderweb pattern. Group several orange, red, or gold tiered serving pieces down the table, tucking small pumpkins underneath. Add a large candelabra on one end, and fill in with crow and rose arrangements. Add bakery cupcakes and cookies, and watch the magic begin.

For stylish, easy, and whimsical table arrangements, begin with quart-size canning jars. Select roses in a blend of autumn colors like these shades of yellow, gold, and red. After trimming away the leaves, cut the stems so the roses are only a few inches taller than the jars. Fill with water, and arrange blooms in jars. Fill in around the lower edges with maple leaves. Add interest by perching a black crow replica (available at craft and variety stores) atop each arrangement.
